title: Shanghai starts China's biggest COVID-19 lockdown in 2 years - The Associated Press - en Español
content: Shanghai starts China's biggest COVID-19 lockdown in 2 years  The Associated Press - en EspañolView Full Coverage on Google News
description: BEIJING (AP) — China began its most extensive lockdown in two years Monday to conduct mass testing and control a growing outbreak in Shanghai as questions are raised about the economic toll of the nation's “zero-COVID” strategy.
